Translations.Text: Yakhana asamana bidirna habe
ara yakhana naksatramandali biksiptabhabe jhare parabe
ara yakhana sagaragulo bisphorita kara habe
ara yakhana kabarasamuha unmocita habe
takhana pratyeke janabe, se ki age pathiyeche o ki pichane rekhe giyeche
He manusa! Kise tomake tomara mahana raba samparke bibhraanta karala
Yini tomake srsti karechena, atahpara tomake suthama karechena ebam susamanjasya karechena
ye akrtite ceyechena, tini tomake gathana karechena
Kakhano naya, tomara to pratidana dibase mithyaropa kare thaka
ara niscaya niyojita achena tomadera upara sanraksakadala
sam'manita lekhakabrnda
tara jane tomara ya kara
Punyabanera to thakabe parama sbacchandyo
ara papacarira to thakabe jahanname
tara pratidana dibase tate dagdha habe
ara tara sekhana theke antarhita hate parabe na
Ara kise apanake janabe: Pratidana dibasa ki
tarapara bali, kise apanake janabe: Pratidana dibasa ki
sedina ke'u kara'o jan'ya kichu karara malika habe na; ara sedina saba bisayera kartrtba habe allahara
Durbhoga tadera jan'ya yara mape kama deya
yara lokadera kacha theke mepe neyara samaya purnamatraya grahana kare
ara yakhana taderake mepe deya athaba ojana kare deya, takhana kama deya
Tara ki bisbasa kare na ye, tara punaruthita habe
mahadine
yedina damrabe samasta manusa srstikulera rabera samane
